summary: This document appears to be a table or chart from a tabletop role-playing game, likely a combat or action game. The main topic is various types of attacks, throws, and melee attacks, including their damage, range, and uses per round. The chart lists different types of attacks, such as "Touch", "Throw", and "Spear", with varying damage and range values, as well as specific examples of attacks like "Shuriken" and "Wood Axe". The chart also includes different types of firearms and their damage and range values.

qa_pairs.answer: Sword, heavy (cavalry saber), Sword, medium (rapier, heavy epee), Sword, light (sharpened fencing foil, sword cane)
